Sus padres le pidieron que baje el volumen a la música y él los apaleó
04 Nov 2019 by Policiales
Un joven agredió a trompadas a sus padres, furioso por haberle solicitado que baje un poco el volumen a la música, mientras bebía con un grupo de amigos y era visitado por su novia, en el Bº Siglo XXI.
Según la denuncia, era un encuentro para que sus padres conocieran a su novia y cenaran.
Cerca de las dos de la madrugada, los adultos instaron al joven a bajarle el volumen a la cumbia y estalló el escándalo. Primero, insultó a padres y hermano y anunció a su novia que debían dejar la casa: “Vámonos urgente”, fue la orden tajante.
Como la chica quedó paralizada en el sillón, la tomó fuerte del cuello, dejándole en claro que no se lo pedía, sino se lo ordenaba.
La joven empezó a llorar y salió corriendo, ya que lo conocía por su temperamento e intuía que ella también sería agredida físicamente.
En la calle, fue interceptada por su cuñado, quien la ascendió en moto y la sacó del lugar.
Ante la policía, la joven añadió que el jueves la atacó a golpes en 9 de Julio y Belgrano. Bastó que le anunciara que quería irse a su casa, para que su novio le apretara el cuello y advirtiera: “Te voy a matar; dejame y te haré imposible la vida”.
Ahora, el muchacho está preso por orden de la fiscal Silvina Paz y los padres del agresor, heridos, pero sin que deseen interponer denuncia alguna.
text:
His parents asked him to turn down the volume on the music and he beat them
04 Nov 2019 by Policiales
A young man assaulted his parents trumpeted, furious at having asked him to turn down the volume a bit to the music, while drinking with a group of friends and was visited by his girlfriend, in the 21st Century.
According to the complaint, it was a meeting for his parents to meet his girlfriend and have dinner.
Around two o'clock in the morning, the adults urged the young man to turn the volume down to the cumbia and the scandal broke out. First, he insulted parents and brother and announced to his girlfriend that they should leave the house: "Let's go urgently," was the sharp order.
As the girl was paralyzed in the armchair, he took her strong by the neck, making it clear that he did not ask her, but ordered her.
The young woman began to cry and ran, since she knew him for her temper and sensed that she would also be physically assaulted.
On the street, she was intercepted by her brother-in-law, who promoted her by motorcycle and took her out of the place.
Before the police, the young woman added that on Thursday she attacked her with blows on July 9 and Belgrano. It was enough for him to announce that he wanted to go home, so that her boyfriend would squeeze her neck and warn: “I am going to kill you; Leave me and I will make your life impossible. ”
Now, the boy is imprisoned by order of prosecutor Silvina Paz and the parents of the aggressor, injured, but without wishing to file any complaint.
